attributes.action: Bring State Pensions in line with the minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: State Pensions should be brought in line with the minimum wage for an average 40 hour week.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring State Pensions in line with the minimum wage."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14629.asp

Prime Minister's Office
